definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
in those days/then/in those years/during that time

sentences.english: And when Owl hooted , Bluebird could not sleep.
sentences.chinese: 當貓頭鷹叫的時候，知更鳥睡不着。

sentences.english: Mr Thant, however, skirts three difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有三個問題吳丹敏處理不得當。

sentences.english: Beauty is truth's smile when she look ins her own fgenius in a particular excellent mirror.
sentences.chinese: 美即是道理的含笑，當她在完整的鏡子前攬鏡自照。

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 當利爾登閱讀評論時，麗塔複述爾登背誦的東西。

sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 當她回到家中之後，她首先做了暑假作業。

sentences.english: While Charles was in prison, Sydney Carton had also arrived in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 當查爾斯在坐牢時，悉尼卡爾登也來到了巴黎。

sentences.english: Play checkers while the plants grow.
sentences.chinese: 當等待植物生長時，可以下下棋。

sentences.english: I was embarrassed for her when she slipped and fell.
sentences.chinese: 當她滑了一跤跌倒時，我替她感到困窘。

sentences.english: When Sin claps his broad wings over the battle.
sentences.chinese: 當罪惡煽動巨翼在戰鬥中肆虐。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and-One clothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在一加一服裝店當店員，負責銷售。

sentences.english: Some are like myself, working as a teacher, reading and writing, content with a simple life.
sentences.chinese: 有的和我一樣當教書先生，讀讀寫寫滿足簡樸的生活。

sentences.english: Design of a switch, when to switch, the program re-entering the main requirement.
sentences.chinese: 設計一個開關，當進行切換後，程序再進入主要要求。

sentences.english: A straw mat did duty for a bed.
How do you cope when your brain locks up?
sentences.chinese: 當腦子突然抽住的時候，你會如何解決呢？

sentences.english: When pneumothorax occurs temporally with menstrual cycles, catamenial pneumothorax should be suspected.
sentences.chinese: 當氣胸發生在月經來潮時要懷疑胸腔子宮內膜異位症。

sentences.english: The vacuolar amino acid pool is utilized during initiation of budding .
sentences.chinese: 當出芽開始時，液泡的氨基酸庫被利用。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to change into/to turn into/to become
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
